entry.title: For the Moon Goddess

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 50,050Chapters: 28/42Kudos: 85

Summary: Stiles is a new novice at the Beacon Hills Temple of the Moon Goddess, where the priests have forsworn all women and have ritual sex to make seminal offerings to their deity. entry.title: Survivors
entry.summary:
Author: Nenufarluz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 108,523Chapters: 39/?Kudos: 191

Summary: The world fell into ruin in just a few days, overtaken by a virus that turned ordinary people into ravenous undead. Amid the chaos, Stiles, a college student in New York, is forced to leave the safety of his dorm and try to make his way across the country. His destination: California, where he hopes to find his father and best friend still alive.The journey is brutal. Zombies aren‚Äôt the only danger, here‚Äôs hunger, cold, loneliness, and the cruelty of other survivors. Along the way, Stiles meets Derek Hale, a gruff and guarded man who is also searching for his family. Together, they form a strong alliance, fighting side by side through the devastation.As the world around them falls apart, the two discover something stronger than fear and loss: the growing connection between them. Amid the pain, the possibility of something unexpected begins to emerge... maybe even love.

entry.title: Where Ashes Lie
entry.summary:
Author: TendreChaos

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 58,806Chapters: 10/40Kudos: 49

Summary: Stiles has always known he was different, that there was something inside him people were afraid of.In a society where the supernatural is hunted and contained, sorcerers are stripped of their names, their freedom, and their humanity. After months of captivity behind concrete walls, Stiles manages to escape and disappears into the woods, where he finds a rebel group willing to take him in. But trust is fragile and Stiles carries a secret, a power he barely understands and cannot share.Because if they knew the truth, if they knew what Stiles really was... They wouldn‚Äôt hate the cage that once held him.They‚Äôd build a stronger one.

entry.title: following a whim
entry.summary:
Author: wishingonalightningbolt

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,865Chapters: 1/4Kudos: 20

Summary: The housing thing is a nightmare pretty much everywhere in California‚Äîbut especially the bay. Since Stiles hasn‚Äôt managed to snag himself a rich partner to pay his bills yet, he‚Äôs used to roommates. Housemates. He actually hasn‚Äôt lived on his own‚Ä¶ever. He went from his dad‚Äôs house to college dorms to crowded apartments. He‚Äôs been living with Scott since they were 19, and now that they‚Äôre grown, they rent a house with two other guys they met online. There were many hours spent rifling through Craigslist before they found Derek and Isaac, but it was worth it. -0- Derek, Isaac, Scott, and Stiles rent a house together. Over a year that sees them deal with Derek's troublesome (ex)girlfriend, Stiles' amusing reputation with local singles, and a friendly wager over which housemate is the best kisser, Derek and Stiles fall in love.
